short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy Descriptions and Image Products from Shopify and YouCan, save them or insert them to YouCan Editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With YouCopy you can:
- Scrape product pages from Shopify and YouCan. (other platforms will be supported soon).
- Download Products Images directly in WebP format.
- Copy Product Images and Product description to the clipboard easily.
- Load Saved Product description to YouCan editor while preserving the style.
- Save Pages for later.
